pages.title: Upgrade Tool
pages.text: The $(l:https://github.com/Mowmaster/Pedestals/wiki/Upgrade-Tool)Upgrade Tool/$ when right clicked on an upgraded pedestal, will display details about the upgrade in your chat.$(br)when shift-right clicking on a pedestal itll save a pedestals location (link the linking tool) but it will show you the work area or effected block of that upgrade(may not work on all upgrades)
